articles.title: JK Rowling in ‘arrest me’ challenge over Scottish hate crime law
articles.description: The Harry Potter author described several transgender women as men in a series of social media posts.
articles.content:
The maximum penalty under the new act in Scotland is a jail sentence of seven years.
